about_the_game:
One day, two little ducks decided they needed a change in their lives. Never realizing what was needed, our heroes simply set out, hoping that fate itself would lead them to the right place. But without your and your friend’s help, they will not be able to achieve their goal, so you need to go on the road with them. You wouldn’t say no to these little creatures, would you?
Little duck adventure is a low threshold adventure game. The only thing you need is a friend who can tell you what’s going on his screen. If you find one, you’ll have no difficulty overcoming all obstacles.
- Solve puzzles by working together. Each player will get his or her own experience.
- Explore 9 small locations.
- The game does not require an Internet connection.
- Both players need a communication device.
- The average game duration is 3-4 hours.
Together with your friend, help two cute ducks through many trials. Work as a team to get the big picture. And remember, communication is the key to success.

name: Little duck adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
